author: arkurth
msg: Added $no_cache=1 argument to get_imagerevision_info call in get_request_info. xCAT.pm::_check_image_os updates image.name and imagerevision.imagename, and then calls $self->data->refresh() which in turn calls get_request_info. This was returning the old, cached values.
Removed accidental print line from update_request_state.

author: trawick
msg: move cmake howto/buglist to a separate file, README.cmake

author: vinodkv
msg: YARN-1080. Improved help message for "yarn logs" command. Contributed by Xuan Gong.
